short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reef wallet using Web3Auth social login for account management

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The easiest way to create your Reef blockchain account. No password no mnemonic just use your social account to generate public key. 
Private key is managed in partnership with web3auth.io provider. This is still centralised way but great for holding small value assets with easy access. 
When you want to be more aware about security you should manage keys yourself in a decentralised way with our Reef Chain Wallet extension https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/reef-chain-wallet-extensi/mjgkpalnahacmhkikiommfiomhjipgjn
